content.webTitle: Manchester City v Manchester United: match preview

fields.headline: Manchester City v Manchester United: match preview
fields.bodyText: Manchester City need a victory to ensure Liverpool’s lead is kept to a minimum of 11 points. For Manchester United it is about winning a consecutive league game for the first time since March. Both, of course, want the three points because this is the 179th Manchester derby. Jamie Jackson Saturday 5.30pm Sky Sports Premier League Venue Etihad Stadium Last season Manchester City 3 Manchester United 1 Referee Anthony Taylor This season G13 Y63 R2 5 cards/game Odds H 1-3 A 10-1 D 5-1 MANCHESTER CITY Subs from Bravo, Carson, Foden, Doyle, Angeliño, García, Harwood-Bellis, Cancelo, D Silva, B Silva, Zinchenko Doubtful Zinchenko (match fitness) Injured Agüero (thigh, 15 Dec), Laporte (knee), Sané (knee, both Feb) Suspended None Discipline Y28 R1 Form WLWDDW Leading scorer Agüero 9 MANCHESTER UNITED Subs from Romero, Grant, Chong, Garner, Young, Gomes, Mata, Greenwood, Jones, Tuanzebe, Matic, Williams, Pereira, Fosu-Mensah, Bailly, Dalot, Rojo Doubtful Fosu-Mensah, Bailly, Dalot, Matic, Rojo (all match fitness) Injured Pogba (ankle, Jan) Suspended None Discipline Y32 R0 Form WWLWDW Leading scorer Rashford 9
